column4: you should be able to browse your Vista shares from ubuntu within nautilus by going to Browse Network
or to share some folder from Ubuntu use samba sudo apt-get install samba
Sirdieu that works but not form vista
you need to install samba first to be able to access your Ubuntu from your Vista
i have installed samba
that is the error i get Windows cannot access \\server_ip_address".
Error code: 0x80070035. The network path was not found.
can you ping server_ip_address first?
are both machines on the same network ?
that is ok
open nautilus and right click a folder to share, select Sharing Options
i did that also
any firewall blocking incoming connections?
also in your /etc/samba/smb.conf file in the [global] section set your workgroup option to the same one of your vista pc, or set the vista pc to the same workgroup as ubuntu pc
sirdieu that is done
excluding firewall issues or network issues, you should be able to see both pc's when Browse(ing) the network
either in Ubuntu or Vista
sirdieu the error on vista is Windows cannot access \\server_ip_address".
Error code: 0x80070035. The network path was not found.
i saw that
sudo service smb status ?
